We performed four ensemble experiment families:
- Phase-centered pulses: three-month SO$_2$ pulses (1 Tg SO$_2$)

We conducted 4×10-year ensembles for each phase:
- Baseline climatology with no injection (CTRL)
We executed a controlled modeling protocol in collaboration with Cambridge atmospheric physics groups, combining
We executed a 192-point ensemble on Cambridge high-performance resources
